{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"1","subject":"Metaphysics expert analysis of 境集","description":"Read all 8 essays in the 境集 collection and provide expert analysis from the perspective of metaphysics/ontology. Identify: (1) key metaphysical concepts and their significance, (2) how the author's framework relates to Western metaphysical tradition, (3) translation challenges for metaphysical terms, (4) the significance of the post-metaphysical (后形而上学) framework. Focus especially on 后形而上学 整理 and 范畴论与境 整理.","assignedBy":"metaphysics-expert","timestamp":"2026-02-10T17:16:25.215Z"}
</teammate-message>

content.text: I have already completed this task. The full metaphysics expert analysis was sent to the team lead in my previous message, and task #1 has been marked as completed. Let me verify the task status.
